**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 25 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20 [Valerie (Level 1)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2401) **Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 83 **Perception** +5; (expert) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +4, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +3, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +5, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +5, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +3, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +3, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +3 **Str** +4 **Dex** +1 **Con** +2 **Int** +0 **Wis** +0 **Cha** +2 **Items** [Backpack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=4), [Bastard Sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=15), [Bedroll](/Equipment.aspx?ID=7), [Flint and Steel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=21), [moderate juggernaut mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=94), [Rations](/Equipment.aspx?ID=40) (1 week), [Scale Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=8), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (20 arrows), [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10), [torches](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) (3), [Waterskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=62) --- **AC** 17 **Fort** +7 **Ref** +6 **Will** +3 **HP** 21 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**[Reactive Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=360)**
**[Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** bastard sword +9 ([two-hand d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)), **Damage** 1d8+4 slashing **Ranged** shortbow +6 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 1d8 piercing **Ancestry Feats** [Natural Skill](/Feats.aspx?ID=71) (Diplomacy, Society) **Class Feats** [Reactive Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=360) **General Feats** Shield Block, [Toughness](/Feats.aspx?ID=855) **Skill Feats** [Quick Jump](/Feats.aspx?ID=825) **Class Abilities** Attack of Opportunity, Shield Block
name: Valerie (Level 1)
